website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative to our top pick for those who want an effective, talc-free baby powder.
pros: Aloe and vitamin E to soothe skin
cons: Some users have complained that the bottles are smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Not pure cornstarch
customer_reviews.text: This product contains Hydroxyapatite, which is derived from bovine bone. Threw mine away.
customer_reviews.author: B.R.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: don’t buy it. It’s really small-travel sizes that usually sells for $1.00. Real size compared to my coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the correct product!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the same product as shown. It's not worth it to return it because it was an under $2 add on item but I am disappointed that what I received was not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jackson

customer_reviews.title: 4 oz is travel size
customer_reviews.text: Came exactlyas described. I just didn't realize 4 oz meant travel size. So just realize that
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Whatch out... these are the small bottles of powder - grossly overpriced !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this two pack based on the photo alone, having used this product for years, I assumed these were the standard larger size bottles and I was surprised to open the box containing two travel size bottles of powder. The price shows $7.19 on the description... that is for EACH small bottle! So these two cost me $14.38... a total price rip off! Live and Learn.....
customer_reviews.author: Les H

customer_reviews.title: MINI POWDER
customer_reviews.text: I brought this thinking it was a full size because the picture makes it look big, but dont be fooled...its definitely TRAVEL SIZE...but perfect for the baby bag so still 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: 🎼ymphony 💖.

customer_reviews.title: Read the ounces- this is a super small size!
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy expensive for such a small bottle- it doesn't even make sense! I thought this was a full size bottle because I did not read the ounces. Imagine my surprise when I opened the box and this mini travel powder rolled out and I realized I paid over $5 for this thing. Save your money and buy a store brand that's cheaper. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: kristina massoni

customer_reviews.title: read the write up
customer_reviews.text: It was my fault....I did not read that it was just 4 oz. thought for the price of $7.91 it would be the large size. Once again,,,,my fault. READ READ READ..... huge price to pay for a small travel size powder. I will not buy this item again. Be aware!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Should have paid attention to the size of the product. This is travel size
customer_reviews.text: Since I was making a next day order (thanks Amazon Prime) I decided to get this product too instead of picking it up at the supermarket. I was expecting a full size product for the money but it was actual travel size, and not a good value to me. I am not so fond of the scent, but at least it does not last too long. I purchased it to take the shine out of my wigs and it works good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dee T

customer_reviews.title: Tiny size
customer_reviews.text: Lol, I thought this was a regular size. I thought that the price was high even for a regular size but when I opened up the box and realized it was a teeny travel size I burst out laughing to keep from crying, goodness. I definitely wouldn't buy this again from Amazon, I'll just get it at Walmart even though I'm not shopping in public much these days.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Trial size
customer_reviews.text: Its baby powder. However, it's a trial size, not the normal size I intended, take note if you are looking for full size product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.... Ita a tiny bottle
customer_reviews.text: Its a sample bottle! Not worth the price. I feel like i was jipped but it clearly states i ordered the small bottles so i will keep them but i would NOT recommend buying this size as its extremely over priced
customer_reviews.author: Kyiah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent & how it makes you feel so fresh
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. I love how it makes us all feel cool and fresh-smelling on a hot summer's day. I carry the small travel-size in my purse and you can use it to just freshen up a bit if you're out and it's a very hot day. If you get overheated it cools the skin down and it refreshes you.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: NOT unscented, small size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this believing it was unscented. That’s what I searched for, this was the result. It’s not. It smells exactly like other baby powder, which I find repulsive. To top it off, it is a small bottle. I also did not realize that. Almost $8 for a travel size is maddening.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Keim

customer_reviews.title: Not corn starch, good product
customer_reviews.text: I tried others and researched a little, i am a daily user for my thin delicate skin. It is better than store chain brands due to good milling, no clumping, etc. It is a very important item for me. I won't buy others anymore unless this one changes .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Standard baby powder, very small size
customer_reviews.text: At first was shocked how small this is but honestly ended up a good size for the purpose I needed. If you need it regularly, find a larger bottle. If you want to stash this in your medicine cabinet and use once in a while, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beaware!! Photo of the actual size is misleading!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is misleading, shows that the bottle is larger than it really is! You have to read to see the actual size, which I know that's something I should have noticed, but I haven't had to do so the 8 yrs I've been shopping on Amazon. It's more issues now than ever in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This powder is much softer and fluffier than regular Johnson’s baby powder. Works great on my son to prevent chafing. I almost never have to use diaper cream on him if I sprinkle a little of this on during diapering.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Conrad

customer_reviews.text: My go to powder for myself. I use powder daily, it’s a habit in my household and a result of my upbringing. I do love that this is pure cornstarch and it smells delicate and lovely. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this one! I purchased off Amazon without knowing exactly which one I wanted haha. It smells so wonderfully and I know it doesn't help daipers rash other than moisturizing it while protecting against wetness! Just a bonus it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Size versus price?
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of this powder. Great size for travel—that’s why I made my first purchase and put it on subscribe and save. Unfortunately, the price skyrocketed and isn’t comparable to the size of the product. Cancelled my order.
customer_reviews.author: tryitall

customer_reviews.title: No asbestos
customer_reviews.text: Talc is formed under the same conditions as asbestos. Cornstarch doesn't carry that risk. This smells better than plain cornstarch. Bottle is in the small size but it works well
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Powder
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 @ $4.51 got 3 @ $6.95 not sure what the deal is!!!! Items are fine but no word on the Fourth bottle of powder, hope it arrives at no charge!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Choquette

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Always keep on hand. Something comforting about it....been using for years. Step out of the shower, dry off and sprinkle a little on....
customer_reviews.author: JANET GAGNON

customer_reviews.title: Great size - 4 oz.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel and also for home. I use this powder sparingly, so these 2 4 oz boxes will last for several years. Happy to find it priced under $2 each. Happy with the product and with the transaction/delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Its safe! Good to use
customer_reviews.text: Love Johnson's baby powder. The product has been tested by independent labs and is safe. The price is a bit too much!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mettler

customer_reviews.title: Love Johnson's baby products especially their baby powder with aloe vera
customer_reviews.text: Love Johnson's Baby powder and we use in especially in the heat we have been experiencing. Another discovery is if you have small children with sand stuck to their legs. Just put the baby powder on and the sand will fall right off.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Best way to get sand off your kids after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Best way to get sand off your kids after a day at the beach! Sprinkle a little onto the sandy body part and rub the sand off.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell....too small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected so I'm guessing I missed that bit of info in the description... My bad...amyway, overall it served it's purpose
customer_reviews.author: Fahtina

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Very small box. I didn't realize it's travel size. Read the details properly!
customer_reviews.author: D.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo substitute when my hair needs a quickie.
customer_reviews.text: Great its smaller! I use for my hair when I want to touch up my hair instead of shampooing. Its an easy quick fix for the moment. I shake a “little” powder on a hand towel and gently fluff my hair. It works!
customer_reviews.author: vick

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs well and smells nice but not like a baby...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Except for that if you can use this on a baby you can use it on yourself, in all of your folds, cracks and curvaceous without irritation. Oh yes it smells good too but not like a baby!
customer_reviews.author: BoolynnlooTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Travel size
customer_reviews.text: This was very deceiving. I thought it was regular size, but it was a tiny trial size. I couldve gotten thst size cheaper at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Casciano

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great substitute for expensive dry shampoos. Shake in hair. Brush and style.
customer_reviews.author: ktebhill

customer_reviews.title: awesome stuffl and the
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the travel size to try it out before buying full size. I'm very happy with it. It smells just like the origina
customer_reviews.author: PJPenaMuma

customer_reviews.title: Helps with squeaking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Some of my shoes starting squeaking, so I put this under the insoles to help dry them. It worked but needs to be re-applied sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mason

customer_reviews.title: To expensive
customer_reviews.text: Unless from Amazon no third party most likely will not buy again Price outrageous . For 2 travel sizes Walmart is where I will go..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I mean its exactly as described. Good size, easy use, good for traveling. Though hate how it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Mini-size.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a full size, wish I would of read the product better haha. This is a mini-travel size. Still love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: It was a rip off. I paid 5.29 and found a 15 ounce container in the grocery store for 4.99. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love Johnson and Johnson
customer_reviews.text: A real emergency until next pay day. Baby was diaper rash.getting
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Kay

customer_reviews.title: A Smooth Powder
customer_reviews.text: Heck with babies! Lol! I have used this powder for years. I like the light scent, ultra fine & smooth powder and it contains NO talc! This size is easy to travel with too.
customer_reviews.author: kbringe

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I use this down under to maintain dryness. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Kris G

customer_reviews.title: Momma approved
customer_reviews.text: Use for my babies diaper rash. Works well to keep her dry. Smells nice and she doesnt get irritated from it. Bottle is a little small but it actually works nice for applying as it fits nice in my hand and the smaller top means it's easier to control the sprinkle of powder.
customer_reviews.author: Erin F

customer_reviews.title: Travel size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling. I use it to keep my clothes fresh during back packing in Asia
customer_reviews.author: BradleyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Travel size
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $5 a bottle for these as I’m an idiot and didn’t realize that the 4oz bottle is the same size as a travel size $1 bargain bin item. The product is fine, but the listed price for this product preys on idiots like me thinking it’s bigger cause of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Small size cornstarch
customer_reviews.text: Talc in 2018... hard pass. Cornstarch and scented in a small size for a road warrior like myself. Arrived not beaten with powder everywhere. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my baby away from diaper rashes most of the time and thats my real use btw
customer_reviews.author: Ashish verma

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!! SMALL bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced!! This is a 4oz - SMALL BOTTLE. You can get for $1 @ Walmart!

customer_reviews.title: Not the best healthy baby powder
customer_reviews.text: Did not like at all. Did not have the ingredients the description mentioned. No Aloe, No Vitamin E. And, it is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S.

customer_reviews.title: It's Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was a travel sized bottle for $5+. I should've just went to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Keaton

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like baby powder, feels like baby powder, and works for my sweaty sack.

customer_reviews.title: Always in my travel bag
customer_reviews.text: The use of baby powder is underrated. See my review for the matching baby cologne splash.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Perez

customer_reviews.title: Clean fresh feeling
customer_reviews.text: Great for rash and helps cut down on friction between skin and clothes
customer_reviews.author: ceaser trevino

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Trusted brand, great scent, perfect size for travel, a little expensive for the size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I was purchasing the bigger size of this item. Then I just had to put it back on my shelf for travel since I wanted a bigger container.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Keith Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: What a scam I bought this thinking it was a normal six’s bottle but it’s just they travel size. I looked at it, went. Through the photos and it seemed to be the normal size I wanted but that’s not the case. 1) I payed WAY TO MUCH for this and 2) I got ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: It's baby powder...
customer_reviews.text: and it does baby powder things. Product is all it says it is. The size is smaller so good for travel or discretion.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: no expiration date on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: no expiration date on the bottle,that is a safe”s problem,very important for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Manci

customer_reviews.title: great for baby bums and thick thighs
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good and keeps my baby's butt dry! He has never had a diaper rash *knock on wood* and I'm convinced it's because I use this baby powder. I also use it on myself when I'm wearing a dress and prevents chubrub chafing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It makes my crotch feel like a soothing cloud of awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great but small!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but this is a tiny bottle for a (comparatively) hefty price! I don't know why - I thought I was buying a much larger size. Check the stats. Does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottle
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for not looking at the size. It’s tiny! Don’t order this unless you’re looking for travel size.
customer_reviews.author: RNmom

customer_reviews.title: Way too much money for the size of product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but somehow I missed the fact that it is a tiny little 4oz container for $7. Not sure if this company always overcharges or if just price gouging during the pandemic. I will be more attentive to the details from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Travel size
customer_reviews.text: I guess I missed it but this is a travel size...
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Parlin

customer_reviews.title: Smell is subtle and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the baby powder with aloe included because it makes the powder have a subtle smell and is great for using in my hair when it’s oily and needs a little pick me up. Great for traveling as well.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up oil in my hair for non-washing days and has a much better smell than aerosol spray dry shampoos and regular baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this in place of dry shampoo. Soaks up oil in my hair for non-washing days and has a much better smell than aerosol spray dry shampoos and regular baby powder.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Montez

customer_reviews.title: price not great for the size
customer_reviews.text: this is only 4oz bottle, it is too small for this price, too costly. regret that why i did not notice that is a travel size
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sander

customer_reviews.title: Too light and puffs into the air too much
customer_reviews.text: No matter how gently I shake this out the powder ends up in the air. We end up breathing it in and that is not a good thing for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not to big or to small. Just right. will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Like the J&J cornstarch in larger travel size
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s larger but still travel size and it has cornstarch.

customer_reviews.title: Baby Powder
customer_reviews.text: It is baby powder... Does as you expect baby powder to do...
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Slightly deceiving....
customer_reviews.text: El. Oh. El. Jokes on me for not reading reviews and catching that it was 4oz. bottle. Oh well at least I’ll add it to the diaper bag. $5 for travel size baby powder is ridiculous but hey they threw in a free pack of Claritin so whatever. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on Smooth and Keeps you Dry
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat JnJ for quality baby products. It goes on soft and is ideal for sensitive skin. It is perfect for both adults and children!

customer_reviews.title: Needed to be made more aware it was travel size
customer_reviews.text: Should be made aware of that it was a travel size it look like the same size as the hairspray disappointed I needed a full container
customer_reviews.author: donna w

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: What I really wanted was the lavender and camomile but had to settle for this but im not sorry I got it

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bad quality. Highly chalky. Will not recommend at all. Seems like it’s fake.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy for Baby Powder Lovers

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a tiny bottle. Buyer beware - it’s a rip off!

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I always used cornstarch powder. It is very good but the price was somewhat high. Won’t buy on line again.

customer_reviews.text: Cornstarch baby powder is safe. Just don't get the baby powder with talc powder. That's the one that the lawsuits on ovarian cancer is because of.

customer_reviews.text: The best product out there for that "Southern humidity heat!" Without it, I receive skin rashes such as 'heat rash" or just a contact dermatitis from skin on skin. Ugh! Even under the arm this is needed in the South, even in areas where you do not think your skin touches itself!

product_meta.title: Johnson's Baby Powder with Naturally Derived Cornstarch Aloe & Vitamin E, Hypoallergenic, 4 oz
product_meta.description: Johnson's Aloe & Vitamin E naturally derived cornstarch baby powder gently absorbs moisture to soothe delicate skin, and leave it feeling soft and smooth. Specially formulated for babies, this naturally derived cornstarch baby powder is dermatologist tested and clinically proven mild and gentle. This hypoallergenic baby powder is free of parabens, phthalates, dyes, and harsh fragrances. Formulated to be gentle, never harsh, this powder has a light, silky texture for easy application. It's great for kids and adults, too! Try it at the beach to help easily remove sand or use it as a dry shampoo alternative for adults.
feature_bullets: 4-ounces of Johnson's baby powder with naturally derived cornstarch, aloe, and vitamin E provides a gentle way to soothe your baby's skin and leave it feeling soft and smooth
Hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested, and specially designed for baby's delicate skin, this naturally derived cornstarch baby powder is clinically proven mild and 100% gentle
This cornstarch powder quickly absorbs moisture, and is free of parabens, phthalates, dyes, and sulfates
This naturally derived cornstarch baby powder is great for kids and adults too. Try it at the beach to help remove sand, or as a dry shampoo alternative for adults.
For over 125 years, Johnson's formulas have been specifically designed for baby's delicate skin. To use, shake baby powder directly into your hand, away from the face, before smoothing onto the skin
